description:
Easy to learn and very interesting mahjong connect puzzle game. The game is very simple — you just need to collect paired pictures. But with each level, the difficulty increases and the game turns into a real attention training!

The goal of the game is to remove all paired pictures from the playing field within a certain time. The game is over if the player successfully removes all the pictures or the allotted time has expired.

GAME FEATURES:
- The classic puzzle in a new look!
- Lots of colorful levels!
- Bright and juicy pictures!
- Nice meditative music
name: Mahjong Connect Onet Puzzle
intro: Welcome to the colorful mahjong connect puzzle — connect all paired pictures!
